features: ULTIMATE 2-in-1 CLEANSER – OrganiWash was formulated to clean both silicone menstrual cups and your entire body. This wash gently cleanses and freshens up intimate area while maintaining natural pH levels to alleviate odor and irritation.

FRESH CUP – OrganiWash formula has no strong chemicals and washes off very easily taking dirt, stains and bacteria with. Keep your period cup clean between uses with ingredients that won’t irritate your skin, or the silicone.
SUITABLE FOR ALL SKIN TYPES – Formulated for sensitive skin and safe for daily use for all skin types. It’s pH-balanced, Perfume-free, Vegan and Allergy-Certified
PREMIUM INGREDIANTS - 40% are of organic quality and 98% are of natural quality. Free of BPA, parabens, phthalates, artificial fragrances, dyes, alcohols, and animal-derived ingredients.

HOW TO USE IT - For the menstrual cup: Wash your hands and cup using a small amount of the wash and water before insertion and after removal. For your body: Pour a small amount of the wash onto your hands, apply to the external parts of your vagina and rinse. Can also be used as a facial wash and overall body was
body.description: Menstrual Products That Don't Pollute Our Bodies and Planet pH-balanced 2-in-1 Cleanser for Menstrual Cup Users AllMatters (formerly OrganiCup) was founded in 2012 with an ambition to grow the category of reusable period products. The starting point was to make a simple and sustainable cup brand that's accessible to all. Later, we launched the cup wash which is a pH-balanced 2-in-1 cleanser for menstrual cup users. It can be used both to clean your menstrual cup and your body.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Contains No Allergens Mild perfume-free soap that does not cause discomfort or irritation compared to regular hand soap. 40% of the ingredients are of organic quality and 98% are of natural quality Can be used to clean your menstrual cup and as an intimate wash Menstrual Products That Don't Pollute Our Bodies and Planet pH-balanced 2-in-1 Cleanser for Menstrual Cup Users AllMatters (formerly OrganiCup) was founded in 2012 with an ambition to grow the category of reusable period products. The starting point was to make a simple and sustainable cup brand that's accessible to all. Later, we launched the cup wash which is a pH-balanced 2-in-1 cleanser for menstrual cup users. It can be used both to clean your menstrual cup and your body.

Suitable for Menstrual Cup and Intimate Body Washing For menstrual cup use: Wash your hands and cup using a small amount of the wash and water before insertion and after removal. Cleaning a menstrual cup with soap is not necessary but if you’d like to, we recommend that you always use a mild, pH-balanced, and perfume-free soap, seeing as regular hand soap can cause discomfort, irritation, and infections. For body use: For your body Pour a small amount of the wash onto your hands, apply to the external parts of your body and rinse. Can also be used as a facial wash and overall body wash. Only a small amount required for each wash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it
reviews.reviewText: Although this is marketed as a menstrual cup wash I use it as an everyday wash. I bought this when it was called OrganiWash and came in the white bottle. After I finished that bottle I tried a few other ones from different brands and this one is by far my favorite. At first I was expecting the white bottle and not going to lie I thought they sent me the wrong product. But I looked up the store and they have changed their name to AllMatters. The bottle is small but you only need a pea size amount, it lathers up nicely. It gets rid of any smells, I have used it after shaving and it does not irritate or burn my skin even if I get a little razor cut. It also has lactic acid which helps to brighten up the skin and I can see my inner thighs lighter just from using this but like I said I have been using this for a while and will continue to. Overall I love the packaging, the simple ingredients, it’s fragrance free but makes me feel super clean!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product! Glad I found it
reviews.reviewText: This is an amazing product! I have extreme sensitivity in my intimate area and cannot use body wash or even feminine washes because they irritate me and throw off my pH balance. I decided to try out a menstrual cup because I hate pads and tampons aren’t so great either, so I purchased this product to cleanse my menstrual cup and also tried it as a feminine wash. I really like it and purchased more. The first time I tried it I noticed an irritation, an almost “burning” sensation, but I thought that may have been due to my pH trying to balance itself after using a regular body wash before trying this product. I gave it another chance and no issues since! Plus it’s the best wash I’ve ever used on my intimate area. It’s thick and a little goes a long way. I had to get more. I cannot smell any scent but plastic from the packaging.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A little goes a long way!
reviews.reviewText: Completely unscented and concentrated so a little goes a long way. Works well as a period/menstrual cup wash or a vulvar wash. Hasn’t messed up my pH during my period, after intimate times, or on normal days. Does a great job cleaning on all of those occasions with no irritation. Definitely will buy again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars 4 stars for unexpected bottle
reviews.reviewText: This is the 3rd or 4th bottle of this cleanser I have ordered from Organicup. I was afraid I received a false product when I opened up a green bottle (as opposed to the white/pink), but I checked the website and the company has changed name and branding. I hope the quality of the product remains the same. It seems to work as expected. For clarity, I think it would be helpful for the company to re-list the product or change the pictures to reflect the new branding. I specifically buy from this company bc they use safe and clean ingredients that are gentle on v area.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars NO ALTERA EL PH
reviews.reviewText: No tiene fragancia, no altera el ph. Tamaño ideal para llevar para viajes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice cleanser for a menstrual cup!
reviews.reviewText: I use it for my current menstrual cup and I must say it works as advertised! No strong perfume scent! A weak scent but not overpowering. Cleans the cup very well! Make sure to squirt a dime-sized amount or else you accidentally wash off more soap than you needed.The only nitpick is the difficulty of removing the cap off. You got to have a good grip from your thumb and push open with some force. But closing the cap is much easy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best one yet
reviews.reviewText: I love this product. I tried it for a whole year before I writing my review. It has a mild smell and its soft on my skin and I didn't have to use a lot of the product to make it work. I use a drop or 2 to wash my privates and to clean my cup. I just got another one and I think I'm gonna stick to this product as long as it keeps working the way it has been working. Is not super tick so I gave it 3 stars, which is like a 3 for thickness not in "value".It made my ph level stay in control, which is one of the concerns I had at the beginning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like it..
reviews.reviewText: I like that this is a multi-use soap, which makes it convenient for travel. A little seems to go a long way and it appears to clean very well. I’ve not had any issues or complaints and I’ve been using it to clean my menstrual cup but have also used it as a feminine cleanser during travel. It’s not cheap but doesn’t break the bank and is made with natural products, so I recommend the product, definitely.
Excelente para limpeza do copo menstrual, essencial na minha casa. Preço mais acessível do que noutros sites e não se encontra em supermercados locais.

Ho comprato questo detergente per il lavaggio quotidiano della coppetta, della stessa marca del sapone. È un sapone delicato, privo di profumo e poco schiumogeno. Sinceramente è adatto alla coppetta, ho potuto notare delle differenze rispetto ai detergenti che utilizzavo in precedenza che lasciavano spesso presenti degli odori o residui. Io lo consiglio, buono il rapporto qualità prezzo, ne serve davvero pochissimo per il corretto utilizzo
This soap has no odor and leaves no residue. The only thing is it doesn’t last very long.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 3, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Very pleased with the wash which I used to clean my menstrual cup (I bought it together with a cup). I also used it to clean my face as it is very gentle on the skin. But because of the price, after I finished the bottle (which was a bit small), I decided to swap to intimate wash gel which you can buy in any bigger store and in my opinion it works just fine.

I have an organicup that i have been using for more than a year now. This 75ml goes a long way and also can be used as a regular wash as its safe and gentle on skin. Less than 12 ingredients. Highlt recommend their products
